title: Spectate mode lag?
body:
Am getting some amazing lag when spectating, 30-50s of everyone standing and then 2s of catchup at high speed. And repeat.

Is anyone else having this issue or am I the special one. Everything else is absolutely fine, can play without lag, just no spectating.

replies.body:
Hey quackerjack,

Could you try performing all the steps on the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)? I suggest starting with the DNS setup step. Let me know if anything helps.

-DTN
